product_name: prAna Stretch Zion Convertible Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Put the prAna Stretch Zion convertible pants with 30 in. inseam to the test on your next climbing trip, trail hike or globe-trotting adventure. Pant legs zip off, converting the pants to shorts in warm weather; zip the legs back on for increased coverage and greater warmth. Nylon/spandex fabric resists abrasion and has an all-weather finish to help shed moisture; fabric dries quickly when wet. Feature 2 front hand pockets and 1 rear welt pocket; zippered cargo pockets secure trail essentials. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion; ventilation holes help maintain comfort in warm weather. prAna Stretch Zion pants have an integrated webbing belt that fine-tunes the fit.
short_description: Put the prAna Stretch Zion convertible pants with 30 in. inseam to the test on your next climbing trip, trail hike or globe-trotting adventure.
